title: Rito to Hateno - Morning Easy Run - BotW Treadmill Run Along
description:
Run with Link as they do an easy morning run from Rito Village to Hateno Ancient Tech Lab.

Leave a comment if you want to see a specific game or workout!


00:00 Rito Village
01:50 Rito Stable
04:20 Kolami Bridge
09:00 Tabantha Great Bridge
09:56 Tabantha Bridge Stable
11:20 Seres Scabland
14:10 West Hyrule Plains
15:26 Jeddo Bridge
17:14 Sanidin Park Ruins
21:14 Outskirt Stable
23:30 Great Plateau Wall
24:38 Hyrule Field
27:53 Owlan Bridge
32:15 Sahasra Slope
35:02 Kakariko Village
38:40 Blatchery Plain
40:48 Fort Hateno
42:55 Marblod Plain
46:00 Midla Woods
46:50 Hateno Village
48:50 Hateno Ancient Tech Lab
channelDescription:
Ambient running videos to zone out to while on the treadmill. 
Long single takes that give a sense of progression as you run. 
And some guided running workouts too.

comments:
If you want to see the same route in Tears of the Kingdom and see how things changed.
https://youtu.be/7mcy1BUdefM
alternate title: link forgot his sheikah slate and horse at hateno
Nintendo really needed to take these assets and do a Zelda DLC for Ring Fit. Heck, a full game of just running through Hyrule fighting monsters with exercise. I'd have paid full price.

I was crying cause I imagined people did their jogging in botw instead of real life 🤣
Telling your partner your going for a run and just boot up botw on the couch 😭

This reminds me of when I was playing botw for the first time and didn't want it to end, so I just... stopped fast travelling completely and took my horse literally everywhere. Rode straight across the maps to finish the last sidequests. Just watched Link be on a horse for 20 minutes at a time and called that gaming lmao
